data.title: Bloch Consulting
data.text:
THE VELVET ROPE 25

October 2022, it is with great pleasure to be part of the 25th anniversary and re-release of Janet Jacksons “The Velvet Rope” album. Congratulations to Janet Jackson and UMG. 25 years later, the impact of The Velvet Rope can still be felt around the world, and heard across several forms of music. Since its release, industry…

Read more THE VELVET ROPE 25

Full Metal Holiday

August 2022, we are proud to be a big part in bringing “Full Metal Holiday 2022” back to Mallorca set again. Hitting the island on October 10th, this years edition will bring metal power bands such as, “Blind Guardian”, “Therapy”, Grave Digger”, and many more. Get your full package at http://www.full-metal-holiday.com

Read more Full Metal Holiday

Thank You Bryan Adams

August 2022, we would like to say thank you to Bryan Adams and our Mallorca audience for an unforgettable concert evening with the legendary superstar on July 17th. It was an honour to have such an incredible artist as part of our Legends VIP concert series.

Read more Thank You Bryan Adams

FULL METAL HOLIDAY 2021

August 2021, unfortunately, due to the ongoing Covid-19 restrictions, there will be no “Full Metal Holiday” again this year here in Mallorca. The new date will be from October 10th – October 17th 2022! Stay tuned for more informations!

Read more FULL METAL HOLIDAY 2021

Chris De Burgh Live

June 2021, the “Legends VIP Garden Summer Picnic” is kicking off strong! This one has to be one of our highlights, as we have been admiring this artist since the early 80s. Few artists can lay claim to international success spanning five decades but, beginning with his very first release, Chris de Burgh has achieved…

Read more Chris De Burgh Live

Back in the studio

April 2021, we are glad to be back working on creative projects. Back in the studio in London with our long time great Marco Boi & producer/writer Johnny Douglas.

Read more Back in the studio

NENA Back in Mallorca

August 2020, we are proud to announce NENA live in Mallorca as part of our Legends VIP summer picnic at Golf de Andratx, Mallorca. Tickets as always at http://www.legendsvip.com

Read more NENA Back in Mallorca

FOREIGNER LIVE IN PALMA

July 2020, we are proud to announce the 1st annual “Legends VIP Classic Rock Night” with Foreigner, on June 30th, 2021 in Palma de Mallorca! More acts to follow. Tickets at http://www.legendsvip.com

Read more FOREIGNER LIVE IN PALMA

Lionel Richie Live in Palma

June 2020, ticket sales are well on the way for the new date of the Lionel Richie concert in Palma de Mallorca. The new date is now set for July 22nd 2021. Due to the Covid-19 epidemic, we were forced to move the date along with the entire “Hello” Tour! http://www.legendsvip.com

Read more Lionel Richie Live in Palma

DJ Ötzi new album

March 2020, we are looking forward to the release of superstar DJ Ötzi’s new album “20 Jahre DJ Ötzi, Party ohne Ende” to be released on March 13th. Bloch Consulting’s Roland Michael was able to participate as vocalist on this project.

Read more DJ Ötzi new album

Full Metal Holiday 2020

January 2020, it is time again to book your ticket to “Full Metal Holiday 2020”. Once again, Bloch Consulting will be the local consulting and production partner for the first Metal Holiday Festival in the world. Bands already confirmed are, Sodom, UFO, Destruction, Russkaja, Enforcer, and many more to come http://www.full.metal.holiday.com

Read more Full Metal Holiday 2020

Lionel Richie Live in Palma

December 2019, we are very proud to announce Lionel Richie live in concert on July 29th, 2020 on Palma de Mallorca. Tickets will be available from Friday, December 6th on at http://www.legendsvip.com !

Read more Lionel Richie Live in Palma

Full Metal Holiday

September 2019, we are proud to be part yet again of this years “Full Metal Holiday” featuring acts like Powerwolf, In Extremo, Hämatom, Clawfinger, Bullet, Kissen’ Dynamite, Kaija, Trallery, Extrabreit, etc. Bloch Consulting will again consult, provide and oversee all the production as well licensing of the Festival. https://www.full-metal-holiday.com/en/

Read more Full Metal Holiday

The Jacksons Torrevieja

August 2019, we would like to invite you to join “The Jacksons” in Torrevieja, Spain as part of their 50th Anniversary tour! August 10th at https://www.heatwavepromotions.com/tickets/the-jackson-50th-anniversary-tour

Read more The Jacksons Torrevieja

The Jacksons Marbella

August 2019, we want to congratulate Rocklounge in Marbella to an incredible evening with “The Jacksons” at Puente Romana, Marbella. Well done also to our friends from Marshall Talent, UK.

Read more The Jacksons Marbella

Katrina Sold Out

August 2019, we want to say thank you to all our loyal Legends fans and customers for another “sold out” event. We are looking forward to welcoming you to our future shows and events http://www.legendsvip.com

Read more Katrina Sold Out

Number 1 Sales Charts

August 2019. we are absolutely honored to have been part of the “Nockis” number 1 album “Für Ewig”, released by Universal Music, with our song “Eine wie Du”. Penned by Roland Michael & Amadeus Crotti, the song is the last one of a string of successful tracks written by the duo. We want to also…

Read more Number 1 Sales Charts

Katrina And The Waves

May 2019, we are very happy to be working again with “Katrina (Katrina & The Waves)” for some upcoming shows this summer. “Katrina” will appear as part of the new “Legends On Tour” and “Legends Oceana VIP Boat”. Watch for dates and news coming very soon.

Read more Katrina And The Waves

C Arma

May 2019, German R&B singer “C Arma” has reached the 30 million mark on Spotify for his first single “Yapma”. “C Arma” has tapped into the soulful German speaking R&B market and has claimed the top spot within only a few months. He is currently working on his second single debut album. Check him out…

Read more C Arma

Full Metal Cruise VIII

March 2019, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce that we will continue to work with ICS Service on their upcoming Full Metal Cruise VII heading out on 24.04.2019 from Palma de Mallorca all the way to Marseille. Bloch Consulting will coordinate the work crews for the huge production of this endeavor. We are proud to…

Read more Full Metal Cruise VIII

Full Metal Holiday II

March 2019, it’s time again to announce that Bloch Consulting will be supporting and working with our partner ICS GmbH on the second edition of “Full Metal Holiday” coming this October. Tickets under https://www.full-metal-holiday.com/en/

Read more Full Metal Holiday II

The Les Humphries Singers 50th Anniversary

December 2018, get in line for your “LHS The 50th Anniversary Spectacular” next summer 2019, and sign up at http://www.lhstheconcert.com You will not only see this legendary act which sold well over 50 Million records, but also a start studded line up of artists performing at this show.

Read more The Les Humphries Singers 50th Anniversary

Kee Of Hearts

December 2018, we are proud to share that “Kee Of Hearts” has absolutely smashed Heat Festival 2018 last Sunday in, Germany. With their only live performance ever, the band’s performance was absolutely smashing, and by far the highlight of the Festival. Watch out for “Kee Marcellos Europe” coming in 2019.

Read more Kee Of Hearts

Robbie Williams live at Hyde Park

December 2018, join Robbie Williams live at his only UK concert at the BST Hyde Park Festival. Ticket pre-sale sign up is available from Wednesday, December 6th on. https://mailchi.mp/robbiewilliams/bst-hyde-park?fbclid=IwAR3YGHlL_XST2GOpvhmB0S1G45Ttgo9ZUFdFqWtdX_Cg7vWJu1cHq8dTA1I

Read more Robbie Williams live at Hyde Park

The Jacksons live in Torrevieja

October 2018, we are happy to announce that The Jacksons will also play in Torrevieja, Spain next year as part of their 50th Anniversary tour!

Read more The Jacksons live in Torrevieja

The Jacksons in Marbella

October 2018, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce that “The Jacksons” will be performing August 8th, 2019 in Marbella, Spain during their 50th Anniversary Tour. Tickets under http://www.rocklounge.com

Read more The Jacksons in Marbella

Kreator at FMH

October 2018, German trash metal band “Kreator” will be headlining the first “Full Metal Holiday” festival at Cala Barca. Come and trash the good times with good people and great fans at http://www.full.metal.holiday.com. Fans from all over the world will join together for one solid week under the sun.

Read more Kreator at FMH

Full Metal Holiday

September 2018, “Full Metal Holiday” is coming in a hurry. From October 14th to the 21st you will be able to see and hear 25 great bands and artists in an incredible setting. For bookings go to http://www.full-metal-holiday.com! Bloch Consulting is proud to be working with ICS-Service GmbH on securing that this Festival will be…

Read more Full Metal Holiday

The Jacksons 2019

September 2018, we are proud to announce that we have secured the first two shows for their upcoming 50th Anniversary Tour in 2019. More shows to follow and also stay tuned for details.

Read more The Jacksons 2019

The Jacksons Sold Out

August 2018, thank you for a sold out show with “The Jacksons”! We are very proud to have had a capacity crowd at Port Adriano last Thursday to see the superstars live in concert. Bloch Consulting wants to say thank you to all the loyal Legends Fans and visitors. We are looking forward to 2019…

Read more The Jacksons Sold Out

Walk of Stars

August 2018, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce a new project we have brought to Mallorca. “The Jacksons” will be the first recipients of the “Walk of Stars” a milestone for the island. Bloch has made an exclusive deal to secure the rights to this project and will be bringing many famous stars to Mallorca…

Read more Walk of Stars

The Jacksons sold out

August 2018, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce that our show with the legendary “Jacksons” on August 9th at Port Adriano is almost sold out! Get the last tickets at http://www.legendsvip.com

Read more The Jacksons sold out

Shut Up & Dance

July 2018, “Shut Up & Dance” is a new exciting format in order to enjoy music way after the Mallorca enforced curfew of 24:00. You can now enjoy music until the early morning hours and party all night long! Crazy experience, dress up any way you like, dance all night and enjoy breakfast in the…

Read more Shut Up & Dance

The Jacksons

June 2018, they are coming with big steps towards Mallorca! “The Jacksons” will be performing as part of “Legends” on August 9th in Port Adriano, Mallorca. We are proud to present this legendary act for the very first time! Last remaining tickets are still to be bought at http://www.legendsvip.com

Read more The Jacksons

Full Metal Holiday

June 2018, join the ultimate Metal Party in October 2018, when Skindred, Kreator, Door and many others are taking Mallorca by storm. “Full Metal Holiday” the ultimate Metal Experience coming this October. http://www.full-metal-holiday.com

Read more Full Metal Holiday

Kee Marcello @ Hall Of Fame

May 2018, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce that Kee Marcello was inducted into the Swedish Music Hall of Fame as part of Swedish super group “Europe”. News surrounding the new tour will follow soon.

Read more Kee Marcello @ Hall Of Fame

Rock Beach by Legends

May 2018, Bloch Consulting is proud to kick off the weekly “Rock Beach by Legends” Parties at El Chiringuito on the Playa de Palma in coop with the Palma Beach Group.

Read more Rock Beach by Legends

Legends @ The Llaut

May 2018, we are honored to announce a long term relationship for events and entertainment with the brand new 5 stars Llaut Palace Hotel, directly at the Playa de Palma. This relationship will bring some innovative and incredible events and shows to Mallorca this summer. Hot acts and shows as well as Comedy, Fashion and…

Read more Legends @ The Llaut

Legends Goes Port Adriano

April 2018, Bloch Consulting is teaming up with Port Adriano for this summers Legends concert. The concert, featuring The Jacksons will be staged on August, 9th 2018 at the incredible setting of the luxury Port Adriano. Tickets will be available from Monday, April 23rd at 12:00 noon under http://www.mallorcatickets.com

Read more Legends Goes Port Adriano

The Jacksons

March 2018, Bloch Consulting is proud to share that we will be working with the legendary Mega Act “The Jacksons” on their summer tour 2018. Jackie, Tito, Jermaine, Marlon and Michael, five brothers from Gary, Indiana, as the Jackson 5 and later The Jacksons, became one of the biggest and most popular pop groups in…

Read more The Jacksons

Kee Of Hearts

March 2018, we are proud to announce that “Kee of Hearts” will perform at this years “Heat Festival” in Germany. The band with former “Europe” and “Easy Action” guitarist KEE MARCELLO and vocalist TOMMY HEART of “Fair Warning”, ex- “Soul Doctor” released one of the top 5 Melodic Rock albums in 2017. Besides songs of…

Read more Kee Of Hearts

World Club Cruise Part 2

March 2018, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce that we are handling the production crew to set up the second ever “World Club Cruise” in April of this year. The cruise will leave from Palma and ship around the Mediterranean Sea with an incredible line up incl. Robin Schulz, Nervo, Le Shuuk, Woody Van Eyden,…

Read more World Club Cruise Part 2

Full Metal Cruise VI

March 2018, Full Metal Cruise back on board. With bands like Anvil, Alive & Dangerous, Crisix, Dirkschneider, Rage and many more, the Full Metal Cruise VI is ready to take off on April 15th on it’s way to Marseille. Bloch Consulting is proud to announce that we will continue to work with ICS Service on…

Read more Full Metal Cruise VI

LHS in Hamburg

January 2018, join us for an incredible night with the legendary super group “The Les Humphries Singers” on February 2nd, 2018 at the famous and dignified Laeiszhalle in Hamburg, Germany. Tickets at http://www.eventim.de! The Show is entitled “Gold Gala” and features superstars from the 1970s.

Read more LHS in Hamburg

ILMC 30 in London

January 2018, Bloch Consulting will be attending this years ILMC in London again. With new concepts and fresh ideas into the new season 2018/19. The ILMC will host the biggest and best live music agents and managers for conferences and events in March.

Read more ILMC 30 in London

SAT 1 TV

January 2018, Bloch Consulting has set up another great TV show for legendary act “The Les Humphries Singers” with SAT 1 own “GoldStar TV” to be recorded on February 2nd in Hamburg, Germany.

Read more SAT 1 TV

Back at work with the Czech National Symphonic Orchestra

November 2017, Bloch Consulting is proud to be back at work with the famous Czech National Symphonic Orchestra in Prague, for an incredible cross over Classical Pop production, after the last collaboration back in 2010. The project is set for a 2018 release and will feature pop and classical tunes.

Read more Back at work with the Czech National Symphonic Orchestra

Working on the ultimate Legend Elvis Presley in 2018

November 2017, Bloch Consulting is honored to present a range of different events and activities, surrounding and dealing with Elvis Presley the ultimate Legend!

Read more Working on the ultimate Legend Elvis Presley in 2018

Kee Of Hearts

October 2017, Bloch Consulting has started an exciting venture with the Swedish/German Rock Act “Kee Of Hearts”. The band is built around two true melodic rock superstars: Tommy Heart, singer of Fair Warning and Kee Marcello, former guitarist of Europe! With a line-up rounded out by Ken Sandin (ex-Alien) on bass and Italian drummer Marco…

Read more Kee Of Hearts

“Whatever It Takes”

September 2017, Bloch Consulting is supporting the hottest new commodity on the Electric Music Scene, Toby Romeo, and his debut release “Whatever It Takes” to be released on September 29th 2017. Stay tuned for more.

Read more “Whatever It Takes”

Michael Bolton in Palma

July 2017, the date for the big Michael Bolton “Legends” show is moving closer. The Grammy Award winning singer will perform in Palma de Mallorca, Son Fusteret on August 12th! There are still a few tickets left at https://www.legendsvip.com!

Read more Michael Bolton in Palma

JJ Rosa live at Winfield House

June 2017, JJ Rosa will perform live at Winfield House, the private residence of the U.S. Ambassador in London’s Regent Park. The performance is part of a private invitational garden party also featuring KC & The Sunshine Band.

Read more JJ Rosa live at Winfield House

London Beat on July 1st

June 2017, legendary UK band London Beat is set to perform on Saturday, July 1st at the brand new Indico Rock Hotel in Palma de Mallorca.

Read more London Beat on July 1st

Hyde Park Show announced

June 2017, Bloch Consulting is proud to share that the Hyde Park performance of JJ Rosa with Phil Collins has been officially announced.

Read more Hyde Park Show announced

Katrina live on August 26th

June 2017, Bloch Consulting is looking forward to welcoming Katrina of Katrina & The Waves for her live show in Palma de Mallorca on August 26th. She will perform at the new Indico Rock Hotel.

Read more Katrina live on August 26th

“Ab In Den Süden” Number 24 of the 1000 most popular tunes of all times

June 2017, Bloch Consulting is very proud to announce that the cult track “Ab in den Süden” by Buddy vs. DJ The Wave is ranked at number 24 of the 1000 all time favorite hits. “Ab in den Süden” was released by Warner Music in 2003 and held the number 1 spot in the sales…

Read more “Ab In Den Süden” Number 24 of the 1000 most popular tunes of all times

Angel Flukes to open for Michael Bolton

June 2017, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce that UK Supertalent Angel Flukes is confirmed to open for Michael Bolton shows in the summer, for the singer Greatest Hits World Tour. http://www.legendsvip.com

Read more Angel Flukes to open for Michael Bolton

JJ ROSA to support Phil Collins at Hyde Park

June 2017, we are proud to announce that JJ Rosa will be supporting Phil Collins at the British Summer at Hyde Park Open Air on June 30th, 2017.

Read more JJ ROSA to support Phil Collins at Hyde Park

Michael Bolton moved to August 12th

June 2017, due to some changes in the tour schedule of Michael Bolton’s current World Tour, the date for the Mallorca concert of Michael Bolton has been moved to August 12th 2017, at Son Fusteret.

Read more Michael Bolton moved to August 12th

JJ Rosa Live on tour

May 2017, JJ Rosa will start her summer tour on June 8th in Basel, Switzerland.

Read more JJ Rosa Live on tour

Michel Bolton Promo on Public Bus

May 2017, Bloch Consulting is pushing the promo for the upcoming Michale Bolton show on June 15th in Palma de Mallorca. The show is part of Bolton’s “Greatest Hits World Tour” and will feature all is best hits and more. http://www.legendsvip.com

Read more Michel Bolton Promo on Public Bus

Michael Bolton is coming

May 2017, Michael Bolton is heading with big steps to Spain. June 15th at Son Fusteret. More info at http://www.legendsvip.com

Read more Michael Bolton is coming

Ehrlich Brothers in Graz

May 2017, Bloch Consulting is providing production assistance for the stop of the “Ehrlich Brothers Tour” in Graz, Austria this month.

Read more Ehrlich Brothers in Graz

Rainbow Cruise 1

May 2017, Bloch Consulting has just successfully finished the production set up for the first “Rainbow Cruise” operated by TUI cruises going from Palma de Mallorca to Malta.

Read more Rainbow Cruise 1

Walk Of Fame

April 2017, Bloch Consulting wants to congratulate Austrian star cook Wolfgang Puck to his star on the “Walk of Fame” in Hollywood. Wolfgang Puck was born in Sankt Veit an der Glan, Carinthia, Austria. He learned cooking from his mother, who sometimes worked as a pastry chef. When his mother remarried, he took the name…

Read more Walk Of Fame

World Club Cruise 1

April 2017, Bloch Consulting has successfully completed the production crew set up for the “World Club Cruise 1” feat. Martin Garrix, Steve Aoki, Nicky Romero, Robin Schulz and many others.

Read more World Club Cruise 1

Michael Bolton Live in Palma de Mallorca

April 2017, Michael Bolton will appear live in Palma de Mallorca! The date is June 15th, the location is “Son Fusteret”. Tickets under http://www.legendsvip.com

Read more Michael Bolton Live in Palma de Mallorca

Full Metal Cruise V

April 2017, Bloch Consulting has just finished the production set up for the “Full Metal Cruise V” voyage feat. Saxon, Uli Jon Roth, Dog Eat Dog, Phil Rudd, In Extremo and many more. The cruise will go from Palma de Mallorca via Malaga and Gibraltar back to Palma.

Read more Full Metal Cruise V

World Club Cruise 1

April 2017, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce that we are handling the production crew to set up the first ever “World Club Cruise” in April of this year. The cruise will leave from Palma and ship around the Mediterranean Sea. Dimitri Vegas, Like Mike, Alle Farben, Bare Noiz, a.m.m.

Read more World Club Cruise 1

Full Metal Mountain 2017

March 2017, we are proud to announce that we have just closed a last minute booking for this years “Full Metal Mountain” in March/April, 2017. “Full Metal Mountain” is a great alternative to the huge rock festival “Wacken” which draws over 85.000 fans every summer.

Read more Full Metal Mountain 2017

“Seer” nominated for 3 Amadeus Music Awards

March 2017, Bloch Consulting would like to congratulate Austria super group “Seer” to their 3 nominations for this years “Amadeus Music Award” in the categories, Live Act, Album of the Year, and Schlager Act. Keep up the great work!

Read more “Seer” nominated for 3 Amadeus Music Awards

JJ Rosa live at Red Pigs Festival

March 2017, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce that JJ Rosa will be performing at this years Red Pigs Music Festival on June 24th in Payerne. This is the first Festival to be announced for 2017 with more updates to follow very soon.

Read more JJ Rosa live at Red Pigs Festival

Sahra Lee at Tito’s

March 2017, Bloch Consulting is glad to announce an exclusive residency headline show for our artist Sahra Lee at Palma’s most famous night club, Titos for the season 2017.

Read more Sahra Lee at Tito’s

Les Humphries Singers live at MDR

February 2017, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce that the legendary group “The Les Humphries Singers” will perform live for the MDR TV Show “Meine Schlagerwelt”. Other performers include, DJ Ötzi, Die Seer, Thomas Anders, Beatrice Egli, Nino de Angelo, Maite Kelly, Die Amigos, Andy Borg, a.m.m. MDR will air the special on March 3rd,…

Read more Les Humphries Singers live at MDR

LEGENDS LIVE coming in April

February 2017, we are proud to announce the first “Legends” live show is coming this June, 15th to Mallorca. We are bringing a world wide superstar who has not only written hits for Barbara Streisand, Lady Gaga, Cher, Kiss, Bob Dylan, and many others, but also sold over 65 Million records as a solo artist,…

Read more LEGENDS LIVE coming in April

Katrina of “Katrina & The Waves”

January 2017, Bloch Consulting has secured Katrina & Band of “Katrina & The Waves” to perform live this coming summer! More details will follow, incl. full dates and times.

Read more Katrina of “Katrina & The Waves”

Elvis Presley Anniversary Rock’n’Roll Edition

January 2017, 10 years after it’s original release, the compilation album “Elvis Presley Anniversary Rock’n’Roll Edition” is still selling well across the globe. The initial release was certified Gold and was a personal mile stone in our history of record releases. We are proud to have had the honor to share a very small piece…

Read more Elvis Presley Anniversary Rock’n’Roll Edition

Rainbow Cruise 2017

January 2017, Bloch Consulting will provide production assistance for the first ever Rainbow Cruise this spring, produced by Combiful! The cruise will leave on April 29th from Palma de Mallorca and will stop in Barcelona, La Seyne (Toulon), Ajaccio, Civitaveccia (Rome), Salerno and Valletta. This will be the first Lesbian, Gay, Bisexual and Transgender cruise…

Read more Rainbow Cruise 2017

Sahra Lee at Palma Arena

January 2017, Bloch Consulting is pleased to announce, that Sahra Lee will perform a huge benefit concert in Spain, backed by a 60 piece choir. The voices will be members of the Juvenil Sant Josep Obrer choir and it will be their first collaboration together. The event is brought by Spanish newspaper Ultima Hora and…

Read more Sahra Lee at Palma Arena

ITV Coop in 2017

December 2016, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce a surprise and last minute coop with global TV mogul ITV for January 2017. More details to follow soon.

Read more ITV Coop in 2017

Global Citizen Music Festival, N.Y.

December 2016, Bloch Consulting is supporting the “Global Citizen Music Festival” to be held in September, 2017 in New York. More news coming soon!

Read more Global Citizen Music Festival, N.Y.

ILMC 29 in London

December 2016, Bloch Consulting will be attending next years ILMC in London again. With new concepts and fresh ideas into the new season 2017/18. The ILMC will host the biggest and best live music agents and managers for conferences and events next year in March.

Read more ILMC 29 in London

Indico Rock Hotel

December 2016, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce a long term relationship with Mallorca based “Indico Rock Hotel” for artist booking and consultancy. The new hotel will feature one major Rock/Pop act every week and is set to open in May 2017.

Read more Indico Rock Hotel

Duette Still Top 10

December 2016, we are proud to acknowledge the fact that “Seer – Duette bei uns dahoam” still hold strong in the Top 10 of the Austria charts, fighting off the strong Christmas release competition. The album, which also features a DVD of all the collaborations, is one of the highest selling albums in Austria of…

Read more Duette Still Top 10

Tom Petty Live at Hyde Park

December 2016, British Summer Time has just announced another great highlight for next summers Hyde Park Open Air shows. Tom Petty & The Heartbreakers will perform their only live show in Europe. Other performers next summer will include Phil Collins, Green Day, Justin Bieber, Kings of Leon & Stevie Nicks, amongst others. If you are…

Read more Tom Petty Live at Hyde Park

JJ Rosa at Pirelli Gala

December 2016, Bloch Consulting is glad to announce, that JJ Rosa will be performing at the annual Pirelli Gala on January 17th 2017. JJ is working steady on tunes for her upcoming album project and further dates for 2017 will be announced very soon!

Read more JJ Rosa at Pirelli Gala

Sahra Lee in La Voz Finals

December 2016, Bloch Consulting congratulates Sahra Lee for entering the finals of the Spanish TV show “La Voz”. With a grand performance of Celine Dion’s “I Surrender”, Sahra Lee blew away the jury and the TV audience alike and made it into the shows finales, held on December 14th in Madrid. Stay tuned.

Read more Sahra Lee in La Voz Finals

La Voz Spain

November 2016, Bloch Consulting has made a last minute surprise signing for a talent of this seasons “La Voz” in Madrid, Spain. The signing goes in effect immediately and will include management, production and artistic development. Stay tuned for more information coming soon.

Read more La Voz Spain

Bambi for Lindenberg

November 2016, Bloch Consulting wants to congratulate Udo Lindenberg to his Bambi 2016 in the category “Music National”! “Mit seinem Album „Stärker als die Zeit“ eroberte er Anfang 2016 Platz 1 der deutschen Charts – es ist das bis dato bestverkaufte Album des Jahres in Deutschland. Die Tour mit seinem Panik-Orchester sorgte nicht nur für…

Read more Bambi for Lindenberg

“Duette” – Enters the Charts at °2

November 2016, we are proud to announce that the album “Duette – …bei uns dahoam” by Austrian Super Group “Seer” has entered the Austria sales charts at number 2, just slightly beaten by U.S. Superstar Bon Jovi, but outselling Robbie Williams’ new album for this week! The track “Cool”, produced by Bloch Consulting featuring “The…

Read more “Duette” – Enters the Charts at °2

Full Metal Cruise V

November 2016, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce that we will continue to work with ICS Service on their upcoming Full Metal Cruise V heading out on 20.04.2017 from Palma de Mallorca all the way to Gibraltar. Bloch Consulting will provide not only Martin Semmelrogge as spectacular reader again, but also will coordinate the work…

Read more Full Metal Cruise V

Endorsement by Cambridge Drum Company for Kindred Shins

November 2016, Last Saturday Leon collected a brand new drum kit which has been given to Leon as he is now an endorsed artist by the Cambridge Drum Company . Leon and Kindred Shins are really over the moon with this as first and foremost it elevates our sound to a higher level but more…

Read more Endorsement by Cambridge Drum Company for Kindred Shins

Kindred Shins Live in London

November 2016, Kindred Shins are about to play 3 nights out in London, starting on Friday 11th November, White Party – Old Regents Ballroom, Stanford Le Hope, Saturday 12th November, This Is Indie – The Square, Harlow, Wednesday 23rd November, Nambucca – Holloway, Islington! Go out and see this incredible upcoming super act!

Read more Kindred Shins Live in London

UK Festival Awards 2016

November 2016, Bloch Consulting will again be attending this years UK Festival Awards in London. The UK Festival Awards & Conference is an opportunity to recognise the hard work, vision and creativity of the nation’s beloved festival industry.Throughout the day of the event, the Conference invites numerous industry insiders to discuss the issues most pertinent…

Read more UK Festival Awards 2016

EMIFF Mallorca Film Festival 2016

November 2016, Bloch Consulting attended the 5th edition of the Evolution Mallorca Film Festival. The start was a cocktail party and red carpet event for the opening film of this years EMIFF in the Teatro Principal in Palma de Mallorca. Hollywood legend Danny DeVito was on hand to accept this years award for his life…

Read more EMIFF Mallorca Film Festival 2016

Tour Start JJ Rosa

November 2016, the JJ Rosa tour is set to start on November 3rd in Switzerland. JJ is working on her upcoming album and will return to the studio by mid November in order to finish the first single.

Read more Tour Start JJ Rosa

Bloch Concerts

November 2016, Bloch Consulting is proud to announce the official launch of Bloch Concerts this November 1st 2016. Bloch Concerts will focus on promoting major live shows all over Europe. The start was made this year with the Rock Festival “Rock in Palma” and will continue in 2017 with several Rock and Music shows incl.…

Read more Bloch Concerts

“Seer” Album and Movie

October 2016, Bloch Consulting is proud to be part of the production of the brand new CD and movie project of the mega group “Seer”. The groups last 14 albums all went Platinum (1 x 3 Platinum, 2 x Double-Platinum, 14 x Platinum, 14 x Gold. Also, 9 Number 1 albums in the charts and…
